channel.title: Pages on Shahar Avigezer
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Shahar Avigezer

item.title: Nice to meet you!
item.description: I’m Shahar, a Full Stack Developer, former UX/UI designer. In my work at Riskified , I focus mainly on Typescript on both FE & BE and my tech-kick is writing tests and trying to optimize our developer workflows. When I’m off the clock, I’m navigating the beautiful mess of parenting three kids, sharing my thoughts on Twitter and bringing my creative ideas to life. When I’m not writing code and running around the house after my kids, I’m knitting hats, tweeting and creating stuff I’m passionate about.
